modName: Ultimate Weapons and Armor your style
summary: gives you weapons and armor that are in the game but disenchanted to make you powerful and wear your favorite armor and use your favorite weapons
descriptionHtml:
no dlc required
<br /><br />you must go to whiterun and buy them off Histmere in the Bannered mare.
<br /><br />there are no crafting or improvement that can't be done but will come in updates

what is this mod?
what this mod does is that it put all the daedric artifact (unenchanted) and you can buy them and you can enchant them to the way you like it
you have to buy them off of Histmere (new add NPC) and buy them or craft them at an forge most of them are in the daedric tab one is in the ebony tab which require the ebony and daedric smithing perks
author: hazard
